sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const TermsOfService = () => (
{/* Icon and Title */}

Terms & Conditions

Last Updated: [Insert Date]

Welcome to Avyakta, a digital platform built to assist in reporting, identifying, and preserving the dignity of unclaimed or unidentified deceased individuals. By using this website, you agree to the following Terms & Conditions:

🔹 1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using Avyakta, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree with any part, kindly discontinue use of the website.

🔹 2. Purpose of the Platform
  • To report unclaimed or unidentified dead bodies
  • To anonymously share information without fear or bias
  • To bridge the communication gap between police, hospitals, and authorities
  • To provide respectful digital remembrance (if available)

Misuse of this platform for false reporting, political propaganda, identity fraud, or unauthorized content posting is strictly prohibited.

🔹 3. Data Usage & Privacy
  • Personal details submitted through forms are stored securely in MongoDB Atlas.
  • We do not share personal data with third parties except in coordination with legally authorized institutions (e.g., police, hospitals).
  • All communication and data handling are encrypted and privacy-focused.
  • Anonymous reports are allowed and respected, but we may still log device/IP data for security.

Refer to our Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy for more information.

🔹 4. User Responsibility
  • To provide accurate and truthful information
  • Not to upload offensive, misleading, or violent content
  • Not to impersonate others or misuse the "Report a Case" feature
  • Not to exploit the platform's emotional theme for publicity or gain
🔹 5. Limitations of Liability
  • Avyakta and its creators are not liable for false information submitted by users
  • Do not guarantee real-time resolutions or police/hospital response
  • Offer this platform as a facilitator, not a legal authority

We do not accept responsibility for decisions made solely based on the information on this platform.

🔹 6. Modifications to the Platform

We may update, enhance, or temporarily disable certain services for improvements. All changes will be communicated via notices or alerts.

🔹 7. Termination

We reserve the right to suspend or ban users who violate these terms, misuse the platform, or post harmful content.

🔹 8. Legal Jurisdiction

Any disputes shall be governed by the laws of India, and jurisdiction lies within the appropriate courts of the platform's registered state.

🔹 9. Contact Us

For questions or concerns about these terms, contact:

support@avyakta.org
); export default TermsOfService;
